Key Match Events: India win by 4 wickets, with 0 balls to spare
Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 82 off 53 balls
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 32 runs
Shaheen Afridi hit a six and a four in the final overs
India required 48 runs from the last 3 overs
Karthik was stumped by Rizwan off Nawaz
Ashwin hit the winning run with a four
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Virat Kohli's innings as his best for India
Babar Azam acknowledged the efforts of Hardik Pandya and Virat Kohli
Virat Kohli expressed his gratitude to the fans for their support during his struggles
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of more than 90,000 fans at the MCG
India chased down 160 runs to win
The match featured dramatic twists and turns, especially in the final overs
